DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the efficacy of intra-articular allogenic Platelet Rich Plasma injection and steroid injection in the treatment of adhesive capsulitis of the shoulder.
DOC.brief_title: Intra-articular Injection of Allogeneic Platelet Rich Plasma (PRP) for Adhesive Capsulitis
